title: Power
content:
极客时间

极客资料

WebRtc

ddssingsong/webrtc_android: webrtc VideoCall VideoConference 视频通话 视频会议

wbrtc_project: 基于webrtc实现视频、音频通信，项目包含

webrtc 谷歌官方库,没必要看)

Google

Jetpack 集合 | Android官方库All in | Android Developers (google.cn)

Android KTX | Android官方库扩展 All in | Android Developers (google.cn)

Tutorial - Android Secure

JnuSimba/AndroidSecNotes: some learning notes about Android Security

HelloHuDi/AndroidReverseNotes: Android逆向笔记

iamsarvagyaa/AndroidSecNotes: An actively maintained, Self curated notes related to android application security for security professionals, bugbounty hunters, pentesters, reverse engineer, and redteamers

Android 官方示例

android/architecture-samples(官方架构实例): A collection of samples to discuss and showcase different architectural tools and patterns for Android apps

android/architecture-components-samples(AAC架构用例): Samples for Android Architecture Components

android/performance-samples(性能实践用例): Multiple samples showing the best practices in performance on Android

android/storage-samples(数据存储用例): Multiple samples showing the best practices in storage APIs on Android

android/compose-samples(Compose用例): Official Jetpack Compose samples

android/project-replicator(Gradle插件用例): This project contains a Gradle plugin and a small command-line app that allows replicating the structure of a given Gradle project

android/tv-samples(TV用例): Multiple samples showing best practices in app development on Android TV

android/wear-os-samples(穿戴用例): Multiple samples showing best practices in app and watch face development on Wear OS

android/user-interface-samples(UI用例): Multiple samples showing the best practices in the user interface on Android

android/views-widgets-samples(控件用例): Multiple samples showing the best practices in views-widgets on Android

search-samples/AppSearchSample(搜索用例)/app at main · android/search-samples (github.com)

android/permissions-samples(权限申请用例): Multiple samples showing the best practices in permissions on Android

android/animation-samples(动画用例): Multiple samples showing the best practices in animation on Android

android/uamp(音乐App): A sample audio app for Android

android/media-samples(媒体用例): Multiple samples showing the best practices in media APIs on Android (audio, video, etc.)

android/camera-samples(相机): Multiple samples showing the best practices in camera APIs on Android

android/connectivity-samples(短连接用例-蓝牙,WIFI,附加): Multiple samples showing the best practices in connectivity on Android

android/ndk-samples(NDK用例): Android NDK samples with Android Studio (github.com)

Compose

GitHub - FunnySaltyFish/FunnyTranslation: 基于Jetpack Compose开发的翻译软件，支持多引擎、插件化~ | Jetpack Compose+MVVM+协程+Room

GitHub - kaleidot725/PokemonLibraryWithJetpackCompose: This repository contains a Pokemon Library application that is implemented MVI architecture using Koin, Jetpack Compose, Navigation Compose, Orbit MVI.

System

FreezeYou/FreezeYou: 支持 ROOT、免 ROOT 与系统应用模式

aistra0528/Hail: 冻结 Android 应用 Freeze Android apps 220219.25

视频

Easyplex: 多媒体流的观影软件,跟据ExoPlayer进行视频播发器进行封装,MVVM一体化,使用Dagger实现依赖注入

GitHub - guyijie1211/JustLive-Android: 📱一个整合国内多个直播平台内容的App,采用DK播放器播放直播源,用过Socket实现弹幕长互动

GitHub - LagradOst/CloudStream-3: Android app for streaming and downloading Movies, TV-Series and Anime.

GitHub - kl3jvi/animity: 🎦 Android app to watch anime on your phone without ads and best streaming available.

TaewonBae/Netflix: 🥈 2022.1.10~2022.1.17 Android Studio (Kotlin) - Netflix 📌

GitHub - mukul500/AnimeXStream: An Android app to watch anime on your phone without ads.

GitHub - jellyfin/jellyfin-androidtv: Android TV Client for Jellyfin

GitHub - RahulSDeshpande/do-play-tube-android: DoPlayTube | Yet Another YouTube Player App 😁

音乐

enricocid/Music-Player-GO: 🎶🎼 Very slim music player 👨‍🎤 100% made in Italy 🍕🌳🌞🍝🌄 (github.com)

GitHub - RetroMusicPlayer/RetroMusicPlayer: Best Material You Design music player for Android

GitHub - OxygenCobalt/Auxio: A simple, rational music player for android

GitHub - uditkarode/AbleMusicPlayer: 🎵 A Youtube Music like app with a Spotify like design - ad free and open source. Feel free to PR. NOTE: BEING REWRITTEN, HENCE THE REPO WILL BE INACTIVE FOR A WHILE

News

GitHub - MicahSphelele/Inewsapp: A simple news app demo using Dagger 2 and MVVM

MyComic: MyComic安卓在线漫画、小说、番剧阅读器。 (gitee.com)

Chat

GitHub - DevCamp2Flame/FlameTalk_Android: 열쩡 열쩡 열쩡의 안드로이드🔥🔥

zouchanglin/XChat: 基于Netty实现IM系统，以及Android客户端

Telegram

GitHub - exteraSquad/exteraGram: Telegram client based on Android sources with new features

GitHub - satouriko/Telegram: A third-party Android client that uses Telegram’s API.

GitHub - PauloVitorDB/Instagram-Clone-Android: Instagram app clone

Wallpaper

GitHub - milankomaj/data-livewallpaper: Unlock Clock

GitHub - Enes-Kayiklik/Wall-Up: 🏞 Wallpaper app made with Jetpack Compose

合规

allenymt/PrivacySentry: Android隐私合规检测，注解+Asm修改字节码的检测方案 (github.com)

Map

GitHub - organicmaps/organicmaps: 🍃 Organic Maps is a free Android & iOS offline maps app

VPN

GitHub - net-byte/vTunnel: A simple android VPN app.

朋友圈

鲁鸿科技（深圳）有限公司/LocwithMone_android

社区

GitHub - mzlogin/guanggoo-android: 过早客第三方 Android 客户端。

Test

android/testing-samples(测试模板): A collection of samples demonstrating different frameworks and techniques for automated testing

UI

material-components/material-components-android(Material 组件库): Modular and customizable Material Design UI components for Android

material-components/material-components-android-examples(Material 用例): Companion example apps and code for MDC-Android

Net

square/okhttp: Square’s meticulous HTTP client for the JVM, Android, and GraalVM. (github.com)

square/retrofit: A type-safe HTTP client for Android and the JVM (github.com)

Image

bumptech/glide: An image loading and caching library for Android focused on smooth scrolling

Excel

September26/ExcelView: android项目，仿照WPS中excel的功能进行的实现，并进行进一步的功能扩展

指南针

GitHub - KokuraSona/Bompass: A compact, beautiful compass app for Android

Launcher

GitHub - otakuhqz/Omega: Free and Open Source Launcher.

Todo

GitHub - ashutoshgngwr/noice: A native Android app to relax, improve focus and boost productivity with minimal background noise.

音视频

smartyuge/AVBlog: 国内外优秀音视频博客

githubhaohao/LearnFFmpeg: Android FFmpeg 音视频开发教程

renhui/Thinking-in-AV: 音视频开发知识库

FFmpegCommand/README-CN.md at master · AnJoiner/FFmpegCommand

CoderMJLee/audio-video-dev-tutorial: 简单易懂的音视频开发教程

xufuji456/FFmpegAndroid: android端基于FFmpeg实现音频剪切、拼接、转码、混音、均衡器音效；视频剪切、水印、截图、转码、编解码、转Gif动图；FFmpeg本地推流、H264与RTMP实时推流直播；FFmpeg滤镜，歌词解析，音视频学习路线，音视频知识总结、流媒体协议

yangkun19921001/AVSample: 0 基础音视频进阶路线 (MediaCodec、FFmpeg、OpenCV、OpenGL、短视频 SDK、音视频播放器、webrtc)

ChenLittlePing/LearningVideo: 【Android 音视频开发打怪升级】系列文章示例代码（A demo to introduce how to develop android video）。本项目将从MediaCodec硬解，FFmpeg软解，OpenGL等方面，全方位讲解如何在Android上进行音视频编辑开发

microshow/RxFFmpeg: 🔥💥RxFFmpeg 是基于 ( FFmpeg 4.0 + X264 + mp3lame + fdk-aac + opencore-amr + openssl ) 编译的适用于 Android 平台的音视频编辑、视频剪辑的快速处理框架，包含以下功能：视频拼接，转码，压缩，裁剪，片头片尾，分离音视频，变速，添加静态贴纸和gif动态贴纸，添加字幕，添加滤镜，添加背景音乐，加速减速视频，倒放音视频，音频裁剪，变声，混音，图片合成视频，视频解码图片，抖音首页，视频播放器及支持 OpenSSL https 等主流特色功能

aserbao/AndroidCamera: 🔥🔥🔥自定义Android相机(仿抖音 TikTok)，其中功能包括视频人脸识别贴纸，美颜，分段录制，视频裁剪，视频帧处理，获取视频关键帧，视频旋转，添加滤镜，添加水印，合成Gif到视频，文字转视频，图片转视频，音视频合成，音频变声处理，SoundTouch，Fmod音频处理

wlanjie/AndroidFFmpeg: android 读取摄像头和麦克风,使用rtmp推流

TaoPaox/TikTok: 学习音视频的使用

feixiao/learn-ffmpeg: 学习音视频知识，整理资料，编写技术手册

likaiyuan559/TikTokDemo: 仿抖音录制、特效处理、裁剪视频与微信裁剪视频类似

MattLjp/AndroidFFmpegDemo: 音视频学习demo

DownLoad

downloader: Android 文件下载库，几行代码完成多线程断点续传下载

RecycleView

MyGallery: RecyclerView实现画廊效果,循环,中间居中

Tutorial - Android InterView

GitHub - crazyqiang/AndroidStudy: 🔥 Android学习知识点总结 jetpack、mvvm、kotlin、juc多线程等

CharonChui/AndroidNote: Android study notes

linsir6/AndroidNote: Android基础知识、Android进阶知识、Android自定义View相关、面试相关的知识

francistao/LearningNotes: Enjoy Learning

BlackZhangJX/Android-Notes: Android开发核心知识点笔记

leavesCZY/AndroidGuide: 🎁 Android Developer 进阶不完整指南

yoyiyi/SoleilNotes: 技术面试必备知识点：Android、Java、C、C++、Python、Flutter、Gradle、数据结构、计算机组成原理、计算机网络、操作系统、算法、数据结构、设计模式、密码学等等

Omooo/Android-Notes: ✨✨✨这有一包小鱼干

hunanmaniu/AndroidNotes: Android.md

zhpanvip/AndroidNote: 个人学习笔记，Android面试指南

xfhy/Android-Notes: ✍🏻 关注基础知识，打造优质Android博客，公众号[xfhy]的作者 (github.com)

huangruiLearn/hrl_android_notes: 整理下一些基础知识

MrWu94/AndroidNote: Android and Java Note

wildma/AndroidNotes: 本人多年的Android笔记，既有基础知识，也有深度好文！持续更新中…

pengMaster/BestNote: 持续更新，Java Android 近几年最全面的技术点以及面试题 供自己学习使用

wildma/AndroidNotes: 本人多年的Android笔记，既有基础知识，也有深度好文！持续更新中…

pengxurui/Android-NoteBook: 🔥Android 进阶成长路线笔记 & 博客（持续更新…）

wajahatkarim3/Today-I-Learned: 📝 Today I Learned - A list of all things I learn on daily basis

shenshizhong/AndroidIQ: 这个项目越来越像开发指南，或者说是开发工具，有很多我遇到的bug，还有很多我的实战经验后的知识点

进阶学习

jieluote/AdvancedAndroid: 进阶/高级Android, 包含多个较有深度的demo

jieluote/Josp: 手写框架及源码 (BlockingQueue, Glide,Handler,ThreadPool)

jieluote/AIDLDemo: 用三种方式(Service、Messenger、AIDL)访问服务，从使用角度理解跨进程通讯
